TopicTitle: Can't find the mod that gives you an ESP

Articles.Content: So, yeah, orbital construction of the ISS has begun on my ksp. However, i would really like to have the external stowage platform. I know there was a mod that produced this, but now I can't find it. Help!
You looking for this mod ? BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products

You looking for this mod ? BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products

I have that mod now, but it lacks the one part i am seeking, thanks though
Maybe you're thinking of Multipurpose Express Pallet System?
